name: ADOLEBITQUE
description:
In homage to early 3D horror games, ADOLEBITQUE is a survival horror game where players are stuck inside an infinitely looping hospital hallway and experience the decline of their environment from a perfectly normal place to a decrepit center of infection. 

As the player, you must complete small tasks to be able to advance throughout the game, each task forcing you to confront the degradation of the hallway and your increasing proximity to infection and death. Complete with a plague doctor-inspired antagonist that wants nothing more than to keep you stuck in this infinite loop of a hospital hallway forever, ADOLEBITQUE is a haunting experience you won’t want to miss!

Controls
  • WASD to move
  • SHIFT to run
  • LMB to open doors and pick up items
  • E to use the lighter once it is in your possession
  • ESC to pause the game at any time
